services.title: Our
services.description: We offer a variety of options so you can find the perfect way to learn Spanish according to your needs and goals.

items.title: Individual Classes
items.description: Personalized sessions tailored to your specific needs and your own learning pace.

items.title: Group Courses
items.description: Courses for all levels (A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2) in a collaborative and dynamic environment.

items.title: DELE Preparation
items.description: Specific courses for the preparation of the official exams of the Diploma of Spanish as a Foreign Language.

items.title: Conversation Classes
items.description: Sessions focused on improving your fluency, pronunciation, and confidence when speaking Spanish in everyday situations.

items.title: Self-Paced Course
items.description: Monthly subscription that allows you to progress according to your availability, with access to exclusive materials and personalized support.

items.title: Travel Advice
items.description: Survival kit and personalized advice for your trips to Spain, with cultural tips and essential phrases.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey with Spanish?
cta.description: Book a free trial class and discover how we can help you achieve your learning goals.
